com.softserve.taf.services.placeholder.endpoints

Class CommentEndpoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • AbstractWebEndpoint
      • com.softserve.taf.services.placeholder.endpoints.CommentEndpoint

  • public class CommentEndpoint
extends AbstractWebEndpoint
    This class represents the endpoint for managing comments using REST API. It provides methods to perform CRUD operations on comments.
    Since:
    2023-09-05
